name: Picaro
tagline: A simple word alignment visualization tool.
body:
![Picaro banner](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3W-mWMew2swOXpDZ0pCdzFONkE/view?usp=sharing)
### Welcome to the Pico project page
Pico is a simple command-line word alignment visualization tool, written in Python. 
Alignments are shown in a grid format, and you can visualize 2 alignments at once; differences are color-coded on the screen.

For more information, please see the README file included in this package.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
